description: He will lead the senior committee and act as chief minister on external matters.
title: Peter Ferbrache elected as P&R president
title_page: Peter Ferbrache elected as P&R president - BBC News
maintext: During his speech seeking election, the advocate, who said he would be standing back from his legal practice if elected, said: "Enough of plans. Not action this week, not action this day, but action now."
